methods.getNumberFormatter:
Gets the formatter for given pattern.
 
 Note that as time values are expressed as numbers, a number formatter is still suitable for dates.
 

:return: (java.text.NumberFormat) formatter
methods.setPattern:
Set the pattern used for formatting values.

:param pattern: (java.lang.String) - string indicating how values should be formatted.

text:
A formatter for converting decimals into formatted strings.

 For details on the supported patterns see the javadoc for
 DecimalFormat
